feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-14T12:03:18.598506Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;5-羟色胺增强剂可增强功能性大脑连接</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406?returnurl= https://www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T06:02:56.606059Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406?returnurl=https://www.alphagalileo.org/en-gb/Item-Display/ItemId/234406"/>; <作者>; <姓名>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://galileoalphamessages .s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/Uploads/imported/79746_Elsevier3.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 249px;" />;<br />;《生物精神病学：认知神经科学和神经影像学》的一项新研究表明，5-羟色胺增强剂普卢卡必利可用于治疗伴随情绪障碍和其他精神疾病的认知缺陷。该研究发现普卡必利增加功能健康成年人的大脑连接，尤其是主要认知网络之间的连接。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#serotonin-booster-leads-to-increased-functional-brain-connectivity" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36321843" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;意识与麻醉（2009）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ncbi .nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2743249/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T09:02:56.606556Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih .gov/pmc/articles/PMC2743249/"/>; <author>; <name>;Quinzel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Quinzel</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2743249/bin/nihms127862f4.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 134px;" />;<br />;麻醉会导致反应迟钝和失忆，但其导致意识丧失的程度尚不清楚。麻醉剂似乎是通过阻断大脑整合信息的能力而导致意识丧失。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#consciousness-and-anaesthesia-2009" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36323275" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;欧盟建议在初步反垄断裁决中拆分谷歌的广告业务</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/14/23759094/european-commission-google-antitrust-advertising-market-antitrust </id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T11:13:56.606950Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/14/23759094/european-commission-google- antitrust-advertising-market-antitrust"/>; <author>; <name>;HatchedLake721</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=HatchedLake721</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x1600/filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox- cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24016887/STK093_Google_02.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;欧盟委员会已对谷歌的广告业务提出正式的反垄断申诉，称有必要剥离某些服务以解决竞争问题。此举针对的是谷歌的主要收入来源。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eu-suggests-breaking-up-google-s-ad-business-in-preliminary-antitrust-ruling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36324118" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何在 Elixir 中使用 Postgres 触发器监听数据库变化</stitle>; <id>;https://www.peterullrich.com /listen-to-database-changes-with-postgres-triggers-and-elixir</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T09:02:56.607329Z</updated>; <link href="https://www. peterullrich.com/listen-to-database-changes-with-postgres-triggers-and-elixir"/>; <author>; <name>;pjullrich</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=pjullrich</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.peterullrich.com/assets/images/share-image.png" style="宽度：220px ; height: 116px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了如何使用Postgres触发器和Elixir来监听数据库变化，解释了下游进程的概念以及多个进程相互依赖时出现的挑战。文章随后介绍了使用事件系统（例如 Phoenix.PubSub）来扭转代码依赖并简化流程。它还探讨了使用 Postgres 通知作为对数据库更改做出反应的省力解决方案的选项。<a href="https //hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-listen-to-database-changes-using-postgres-triggers-in-elixir" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36323058" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;火星表面的 5.7 太像素马赛克</stitle>; <id>;https://kottke.org/23/06/a-massive-57 -terapixel-mosaic-of-the-surface-of-mars</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T07:02:56.607694Z</updated>; <link href="https://kottke.org/23/ 06/a-massive-57-terapixel-mosaic-of-the-surface-of-mars"/>; <author>; <name>;mpweiher</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=mpweiher</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kottke.org/plus/misc/images/mars-mosaic-2023.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 178px;" />;<br />;加州理工学院布鲁斯默里行星可视化实验室利用火星侦察轨道器的图像，创建了一张 5.7 太像素的马赛克图像，覆盖了火星表面的 99.5%。整个图像可用在浏览器中使用 3D 查看器进行导航。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-5-7-terapixel-mosaic-of-the-surface-of-mars" target="_blank ">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36322395" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自 2026 年 6 月 7 日起，Autodesk 将不再销售或支持 EAGLE</stitle>; < id>;https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Autodesk-EAGLE-Announcement-Next-steps-and-FAQ.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06- 14T00:02:56.608054Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Autodesk-EAGLE-Announcement-Next-steps-and-FAQ .html"/>; <author>; <name>;ambientenv</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ambientenv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; Autodesk 将从 2026 年 6 月 7 日起停止销售和支持 EAGLE。Fusion 360 固定期限的使用许可仍将提供对 EAGLE Premium 的访问权限，直到 2026 年 6 月不再支持它为止。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# effective-june-7-2026-autodesk-will-no-longer-sell-nor-support-eagle" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36319137" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;并行编程难吗？如果难，你能做些什么？</stitle>; <id>;https://mirrors.edge.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel /people/paulmck/perfbook/perfbook.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T06:02:56.608429Z</更新>; <link href="https://mirrors.edge.kernel.org/pub/ linux/kernel/people/paulmck/perfbook/perfbook.html"/>; <author>; <name>;nequo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nequo</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了可以出版书籍的不同格式，例如平装书的双栏格式，大尺寸电子书阅读器的单栏格式，以及电子书的电子书格式智能手机和更小的电子书阅读器。它还提供了获取书籍实体副本的选项，并提到了不同封面艺术品的可用性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#is-parallel-programming-hard-and-if-so-what-c​​an-you-do-about-it" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36318280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;新 RAM 卡，原型 Mac Portable，演示 System 7</stitle>; <id>;http://oldvcr .blogspot.com/2023/06/new-ram-card-prototype-mac-portable.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T05:02:56.608772Z</更新>; <link href="http: //oldvcr.blogspot.com/2023/06/new-ram-card-prototype-mac-portable.html"/>; <author>; <name>;classichasclass</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=classichasclass</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjtxcZARpXDbgZsTqOe0KnzV6snMn2icIuHHzRKIqJqVm3LV6YpfCkFPfal3rOLw6L9SHhpXa YxjNNE5-dFEn_VPD332oGWJ1I5EJk6sbfroxCX0KWsPr8Pgyk00CBaNWVfznenAZZjp3QfYHEfjRTLUZRS-aHjVAWflqCdvV6MXOSxQlzFKqtOhiyE/ s320/PXL_20230613_173747304.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 166px;" />;<br />;文章是对Androda新推出的7MB Macintosh Portable RAM卡的Tech评测。作者建议购买该卡，因为Macintosh Portable的RAM卡很难找到，而且比较旧MacEffects 8MB 升级不再进行。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-ram-card-prototype-mac-portable-demo-system-7" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36321310" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 Rust 制作 RISC-V 操作系统（2019）</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /osblog.stephenmarz.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T04:02:56.609128Z</更新>; <link href="https://osblog.stephenmarz.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;azhenley</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=azhenley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// osblog.stephenmarz.com/feed.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 221px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了使用 Rust 编程语言创建面向 RISC-V 架构的操作系统的过程。它强调了为 RISC-V 提供适当开发环境的重要性，并提到本教程将从头开始逐步构建操作系统。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-a-risc-v-operating-system-using-rust-2019" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36320914" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cormac McCarthy 去世了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com /2023/06/13/books/cormac-mccarthy-dead.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:02:56.609490Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes. com/2023/06/13/books/cormac-mccarthy-dead.html"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/14/obituaries/00mccarthy_cormac-1-print1/00mccarthy_cormac-1- articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px; height: 275px;" />;<br />;隐居作家科马克·麦卡锡 (Cormac McCarthy) 去世，享年 89 岁，享年 89 岁。条件，赢得了无数奖项并被改编成电影，但也因其自我意识的男性气质和缺乏著名的女性角色而招致批评。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cormac-mccarthy-has-死亡" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316079" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Launch HN: Resend (YC W23) – 面向开发人员的电子邮件 API使用 React</stitle>; <id>;https://resend.com</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T13:02:56.609845Z</updated>; <link href="https://resend.com" />; <作者>; <名称>;zenorocha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zenorocha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://resend.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Flanding-page%2Fbghero.png&w=2048&q=75" style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Resend 是一个面向开发人员的电子邮件 API，它提供可靠且易于使用的电子邮件发送解决方案。它提供诸如多区域支持和专用 IP 等功能以提高送达率。< href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-resend-yc-w23-email-api-for-developers-using-react" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36309120" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;麦当劳刚刚发布了一款全新的 Game Boy 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-生日/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T21:02:56.610191Z</更新>; <link href="https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;outime</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=outtime</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://retrododo .com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/grimaces-birthday-gameboy-game-800x450.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;麦当劳发布了一款名为 Grimace's Birthday 的新 Game Boy Color 游戏，由 Gumpy Function 使用 GB Studio 开发。该游戏涉及扮演 Grimace 在滑板上，试图在他的生日那天找到他的朋友派对。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mcdonald-s-just-dropped-a-brand-new-game-boy-game" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316134" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Elixir 类型系统的设计原则 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.irif.fr /_media/users/gduboc/elixir-types.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T10:02:56.610533Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.irif.fr/_media/ users/gduboc/elixir-types.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;weatherlight</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=weatherlight</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;文章讨论了 Elixir 类型系统的设计原则，它是 Elixir 编程语言的渐进类型系统。它概述了类型系统的特征和设计原则，并提供了如何在实践中使用它的示例。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-design-principles-of-the-elixir-type-system-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36311875" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ZX81 机械键盘</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-13T21:02:56.610878Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard"/>; <author>; <name>;zoenolan</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zoenolan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard/ main/images/keyboard-with-custom-keycaps.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：120px；" />;<br />;本文介绍的是与 Sinclair ZX81 及其现代娱乐产品 ZX81+38 兼容的机械键盘。存储库包含键盘的设计文件、导出版本和图像。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zx81-mechanical-keyboard" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36316311" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;游戏化、生活和对金徽章的追求（2021 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://austinhenley.com/blog/gamification.html</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-14T04:02:56.611215Z</updated>; <link href="https://austinhenley.com/blog/gamification.html"/>; <author>; <name>;azhenley</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=azhenley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://austinhenley.com/blog/images/trophies.png" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：101px；" />;<br />;游戏化和指标跟踪对作者的生活有很大的影响，控制着他们的职业、休闲时间、社会关系和财务。尽管知道公司使用的心理策略，作者仍然喜欢游戏化和指标，质疑它们的有效性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gamification-life-and-the-pursuit-of-a-gold-badge-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36320746" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;国宝：chanoyu 早期现代实践者使用的茶具</stitle>; <id>;https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/圆桌会议/国宝</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T09:02:56.611554Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.laphamsquarterly.org/roundtable/national-treasure"/>; <作者>; <name>;棱镜</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://www.laphamsquarterly.org/sites/default/files/1924.326_-_tea_bowl.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了日本茶道中使用的茶具的文化意义，特别关注了进口到日本的中国茶碗 yuteki tenmoku chawan。它探讨了日本文化中的欣赏和挪用与日本茶道茶道的复杂历史之间的紧张关系。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#national-treasure-tea-utensils-used-by-early-modern-practitioners-of-chanoyu" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36305627" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;运行手册之夜：DevOps 恐怖故事</stitle>; <id>;https://bitfieldconsulting.com/blog/night -of-the-runbooks</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T04:02:56.611902Z</updated>; <link href="https://bitfieldconsulting.com/blog/night-of-the-runbooks" />; <作者>; <名称>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/5e10bdc20efb8f0d169f85f9/1634232659574-0XLU246AK5I9T87DNGZT/Beep-Beep-Richie.jpg?content-type=image%2Fjpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：225px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讲述了摩根第一个晚上值班的故事，他们收到了关于他们不熟悉的服务发生严重事件的警报。但是，他们找到了指导他们完成故障排除步骤的运行手册，使他们能够成功解决问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#night-of-the-runbooks-a-devops-horror-story" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36307883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;递归的诅咒：生成数据的训练让模型忘记</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.17493</id >; <updated>;2023-06-14T00:02:56.612258Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.17493"/>; <author>; <name>;indus</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=indus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse /0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;GPT-2、GPT-3(.5) 和 GPT-4 等大型语言模型 (LLM) 在语言任务中表现出令人印象深刻的性能，但在训练中使用模型生成的内容可能会导致不可逆转的缺陷生成的模型，称为模型崩溃，原始内容分布的尾部消失。这种现象在所有已学习的生成模型中普遍存在，必须认真对待以维持从网络上抓取的大规模数据进行训练的好处。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-curse-of-recursion-training-on-generated-data-makes-models-forget" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319076" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;C 中的一个简单哈希表</stitle>; <id>;https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in- c/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:02:56.612600Z</updated>; <link href="https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章解释了如何实现一个简单的C 中的哈希表，包括哈希函数、指针和内存段的使用。它还讨论了哈希表背后的设计决策及其性能特征。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-simple-hash-table-in-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36302552" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我看到的微架构和我希望有一天能看到的微架构 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://hardwear.io/usa-2023/ presentation/the-microarchitectures-that-I-saw-and-the-ones-that-I-hope-to-one-day-see.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T02:02:56.612940Z </updated>; <link href="https://hardwear.io/usa-2023/presentation/the-microarchitectures-that-I-saw-and-the-ones-that-I-hope-to-one-day -see.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;文章讨论了作者在 CPU 错误和平台安全方面的经验和观点，强调了研究人员了解设计阶段潜在漏洞的必要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-microarchitectures-that-i-saw-and-the-ones-that-i-hope-to-one-day-see-pdf" target= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36320316" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Elixir 的“设置理论类型系统”原型/演示/展示</stitle>; < id>;https://typex.fly.dev</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T23:02:56.613278Z</更新>; <link href="https://typex.fly.dev"/>; < author>; <name>;weatherlight</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=weatherlight</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文讨论了一个原型类型检查器用于 Elixir 的集合理论类型系统，旨在对一些示例进行类型检查，尚未反映 Elixir 类型的最终形式。原型依赖于第三方语言，并且具有类型注释的语法，如 function_name :: (type) over function definitions。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-s-set-theoretical-type-system-prototype-demo-showcase" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36299214" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lewis Hine 的 20 世纪早期“照片故事”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the- photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem-180982355/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T22:02:56.613622Z</updated>; <link href=" https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem-180982355/"/>; <author>; <name>;cratermoon</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cratermoon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://th-thumbnailer.cdn -si-edu.com/rL39Jd_skZBVfNEcn2Y62OX_ksE=/fit-in/1072x0/filters:focal(1429x844:1430x845)/https://tf-cmsv2-smithsonianmag-media.s3.amazonaws.com/filer_public/f1/0d/f10dc681 -3be7-45bc-9d8e-b7a895d3bb17/screenshot_2023-06-12_at_95133_am.png" style="width: 220px; height: 130px;" />;<br />;刘易斯·威克斯·海因 (Lewis Wickes Hine) 在 20 世纪初拍摄的童工照片帮助倡导了童工法和保护措施，但这个问题今天仍然存在，因为有关违规行为的报道和州立法的回滚合法工作年龄。虽然 Hine 的照片侧重于白人儿童，但当代关于童工违规行为的报道却很少提供图片来配合他们的文字、图表和统计数据。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lewis-hines -early-20th-century-photo-stories" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36317587" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JupyterLab 4.0</ stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4-0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:02:56.613975Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4-0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178"/>; <author>; <name>;jonbaer</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jonbaer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit: 1200/1*Y3aNGoRED2q0pWjlHmr9wg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 119px;" />;<br />;JupyterLab 4.0 是 Jupyter 开发环境的最新版本，现已在 PyPI 和 conda-forge 上可用。它包括更快的渲染、升级的文本编辑器、新的扩展管理器、改进的文档搜索、UI 和辅助功能改进以及错误修复。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jupyterlab-4-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= “https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315796” target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源医院价格数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in-pricing/数据/主要/速率</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T21:02:56.614318Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in-pricing /data/main/rate"/>; <author>; <name>;alecst</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alecst</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#open-source-hospital-price-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：在浏览器中运行的 LLaMA 分词器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T21:02:56.614656Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js"/>; <作者>; <name>;belladoreai</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belladoreai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/ b5d9aaf9f78ac360d3a02b9f1c8b280e31233a9c460a62d3b4b69f714e7d9a6f/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文介绍了 LLaMA 的第一个 JavaScript 分词器，它在浏览器和 Node 中运行，具有优化的运行时间和包大小。还将它与 Web 应用程序中使用的其他流行分词器进行了比较，解释了 LLaMA 模型的兼容性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-llama-tokenizer-that-runs-in-browser" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316489" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成你的项目</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-项目</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T19:02:56.614991Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects"/>; <author>; <名称>;aarondf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aarondf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /images.ctfassets.net/s5uo95nf6njh/7AlDzZ2iGukvOe26kfIgLJ/fe6c6ab58b880503c20f27a3e364b83f/Open_source_staircase__1___1_.jpg?w=1200&fm=jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 257px;" />;<br />;自述项目旨在通过承认过程中的困难来鼓励人们完成他们的开源项目。这篇文章讨论了从开始项目的最初兴奋到转变的挑战完成它的不那么迷人的工作，并提供了克服这些障碍的策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#finish-your-projects" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;新功能：Raspberry Pi Pico W 的蓝牙</stitle>; <id>;https://www.raspberrypi.com/news /new-functionality-bluetooth-for-pico-w/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T11:20:56.615326Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.raspberrypi.com/news /new-functionality-bluetooth-for-pico-w/"/>; <author>; <name>;crispinh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=crispinh</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.raspberrypi.com/app/uploads/2023/06/PICO-LIFESTYLE-800x522.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 144px;" />;<br />;Raspberry Pi Pico W 是 Pico 平台的无线变体，随着 C SDK 1.5.1 版的发布和最新的 MicroPython 构建，现在支持蓝牙功能。Pico W 的无线功能由英飞凌 CYW43439 设备提供，它同时支持 802.11n Wi-Fi 和蓝牙 5.2。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#new-functionality-bluetooth-for-raspberry-pi -pico-w" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;两阶段对比整体输出解释（CWOX-2s）</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/vaynexie/CWOX</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T08:02 :56.615675Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/vaynexie/CWOX"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/69588181/120742320-3e086280-c529-11eb-9575- 7e78593726fe.png" style="width: 220px; height: 158px;" />;<br />;CWOX-2s 是一种新颖的解释框架，它通过检查竞争类的证据来为图像分类提供对比解释。它使用分层潜在树模型将类标签划分为混淆簇并生成对比热图。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#two-stage-contrastive-whole-output-explaination-cwox-2s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;/ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OnBoard——一项新的资助计划，为青少年的 PCB 成本提供 100 美元的资金</stitle>; <id>;https://hackclub.com/onboard/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T23:02:56.616025Z</updated>; <link href="https://hackclub.com /onboard/"/>; <author>; <name>;zachlatta</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zachlatta</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://cloud-6exi6bz1i-hack-club-bot.vercel.app/0rotatesprig.png" style="width: 220px; height: 177px;" />;<br />;Open source your design on GitHub and apply for the grant! You must be a teenager in high school to apply. Meet others learning how to make their own circuit boards. Collaborate, get help, and support others as you take the leap. Like stickers? Request below and we'll ship you an envelope full of stickers for free.Request Stickers <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#onboard-a-new-grants-program-to-fund-100-in-pcb-costs-for-teenagers" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36318805" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hotel Owners Start to Write Off San Francisco as Business Nosedives</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/hotel-owners-start-to-write-off-san-francisco-as-business-nosedives-e84c64ef</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T10:02:56.616381Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/hotel-owners-start-to-write-off-san-francisco-as-business-nosedives-e84c64ef"/>; <author>; <name>;rgrieselhuber</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rgrieselhuber</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.wsj.net/im-796286/?width=1278&size=1" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;San Francisco's once thriving hotel market is suffering its worst stretch in at least 15 years, pummeled by the same forces that have emptied out the city's office towers and closed many retail stores. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hotel-owners-start-to-write-off-san-francisco-as-business-nosedives" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36323634" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
